title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Discover the limitless possibilities of creative expression with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! This professional-grade makeup painting kit is perfect for both kids and adults, offering a world of artistic and special effects to bring your Halloween, FX, party, and artist visions to life.

With 20 vibrant colors, including flash and aqua hues like bossy gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, this non-toxic and skin-friendly palette ensures your creations are not only stunning but safe. The oil-based, creamy texture allows for easy blending and comfortable wear, while the quick-drying and smudge-proof formula ensures your masterpieces last all night.

Whether you're creating a crown, costume, bruise, blood, or cosplay look, our Athena Palette has you covered. Perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween, this versatile palette is a must-have for any creative spirit.

The sturdy, convenient plastic case makes it easy to take your artistry on the go, while the included sponge and brush application tools ensure a flawless finish every time. And when the night is over, simply wash off with olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover.

Experience the joy of artistic freedom with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette. Unleash your creativity, and let your imagination run wild!
